title: Apple’s Scrapped Car Project Means AI and Headset Bets Are More Urgent
description: Apple told employees Tuesday it was abandoning plans for a self-driving car and reassigned some of the staff to its AI efforts.

title: Google Left in ‘Terrible Bind’ by Pulling AI Feature After Right-Wing Backlash
description: Google’s overcorrection for AI’s well-known bias against people of color left it vulnerable to yet another firestorm over diversity.
